contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=March 2008}} '''''Veinticinco de agosto, 1983''''' (''August the 25th, 1983'') is a chamber [[opera]] by [[Juan María Solare]], to a [[Spanish language|Spanish]] [[libretto]] by [[Javier Adúriz]] based on the story by [[Jorge Luis Borges]]. Solare composed the opera from 1992 to 1993. The opera is approximately 37.5 minutes in length and consists of one act with fifteen scenes. <!-- When and where was it premiered? --> ==Characters== *Old Borges ([[Bass (voice type)|bass]]) *Young Borges ([[tenor]]) *Speaker ([[baritone]] or tenor) *Owner of the Hotel (baritone or bass) *Chorus ==Orchestra== *Flute *Tenor Saxophone *String Quartet *Piano *Percussion (Suspended cymbal, 2 anvils, glockenspiel, vibraphone, 5 temple blocks, 3 tomtoms, tenor drum) [[Category:Operas by Juan Maria Solare]] [[Category:Spanish-language operas]] [[Category:Chamber operas]] [[Category:One-act operas]] [[Category:1993 operas]] [[Category:Operas]] [[Category:Compositions by Juan Maria Solare]] {{opera-stub}}
